app.name: Splatfest DL
app.long_description:
Run MochaCFW SD before running this!
Hold L while running this app to remove the current Custom Splatfest!
This tool allows you to play custom Splatfests in Splatoon. For more information, join the Custom Splatfest discord server at https://discord.gg/grMSxZf. I am not responsible if anything bad happens (However, nothing bad should happen).
